description.raw:
This code generates the nightly schedulers for the different acropolis releases. It replaces the custom job created manually: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gz11-nightly-scheduler](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gz11-nightly-scheduler/configure)

A testing run is ready: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/\_dsl\_ignition\_collection/15/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition_collection/15/)

I modified the scheduler to do an echo on the release.py lines to see if the output is good. Result is here: 

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition-blueprint-nightly-scheduler&build=1)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition-blueprint-nightly-scheduler/1/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition-blueprint-nightly-scheduler/1/))
